# BlendTreeBlendNode

**Structure**

A source node for an animation that mixes several animations to form a single animation.

## Declaration

```swift
struct BlendTreeBlendNode
```

## Overview

A *blend tree animation* mixes multiple animations to form a single animation. The [doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/BlendTreeBlendNode] structure adopts the [doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/BlendTreeNode] protocol, which specifies the behavior of animations that make up a blend tree animation. This structure adds the ability to branch a blend tree at any point. Each member of this property’s [doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/BlendTreeBlendNode/sources] array represents a branch in the tree. For more information about blend trees, see [doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/BlendTreeAnimation].

## Creating a blend-tree blend node

- **init(sources:name:weight:isAdditive:)**: Creates a tree node made up of multiple branches.

## Configuring the node

- **name**: A textual name for the blend node.
- **weight**: A normalized percentage that designates how much effect this node has compared to peer nodes.
- **isAdditive**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the animation builds on the current state of the target entity or resets the state before running.

## Configuring child nodes

- **sources**: The nodes that branch from a node to form part of a blend tree.

## Blend trees

- **BlendTreeAnimation**: A collection of animations on the same property that the framework blends to a single animation.
- **BlendTreeNode**: An interface for a node that’s a member of a blend tree.
- **BlendTreeSourceNode**: A blend node that contains an animation.
- **BlendTreeInvalidNode**: A blend tree node that’s internal only or sources from an invalid definition.
- **BlendWeight**: A numerical representation of the impact an animation has on a scene or entity.

## Conforms To

- BlendTreeNode
